member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.AutoWiring.Infrastructure.AutoWiringConstructorHeuristic
member.summary: Selects a constructor to call during activation by finding the candidate constructor whose arguments have the most bindings defined.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.AutoWiring.Infrastructure.AutoWiringConstructorHeuristic.Select(Ninject.Core.Binding.IBinding,System.Type,Ninject.Core.Planning.IActivationPlan,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo})
member.summary: Selects the member that should be injected.
member.param: The binding that points at the type whose activation plan being manipulated.
The type whose activation plan is being manipulated.
The activation plan that is being manipulated.
member.returns: The member that should be injected.

member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.AutoWiring.Infrastructure.AutoWiringFieldHeuristic
member.summary: Selects fields to inject by determining whether their types have bindings registered.

member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the specified member should be injected during activation.
member.param: The binding that points at the type whose activation plan being manipulated.
The type whose activation plan is being manipulated.
The activation plan that is being manipulated.
member.returns: if the member should be injected, otherwise .

member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.AutoWiring.AutoWiringModule
member.summary: Adds functionality to the kernel to support auto-wiring of dependencies.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.AutoWiring.AutoWiringModule.BeforeLoad
member.summary: Prepares the module for being loaded. Can be used to connect component dependencies.
